DOC.brief_summary: This project conduct retrospective clinical database review one-time research interview evaluate outcome among sub-set caregiver ( CGs ) enrol Behavioral Health Laboratory ( BHL ) Caregiver Outreach Telehealth Education Program ( COTP ) . The investigator recruit CGs whose Care Recipients ( CR ) meet criterion clinically significant cognitive impairment and/or dementia receive care management service COTP .
DOC.detailed_description: The University Pennsylvania 's Caregiver Resources , Education , & SupporT ( CREST ) Program seek improve overall quality life wellbeing old PACE/PACENET beneficiary ( care recipient ( CRs ) ) cognitive impairment caregiver ( CGs ) . Specifically , program provide education , support , service beneficiary CGs PACE/PACENET beneficiary fill prescription medication use treat cognitive impairment . Many beneficiary also meet criterion clinically significant cognitive impairment/dementia . Thus , level contact service vary function report need symptom . The CREST Program develop BHL Caregiver Outreach Telehealth Program ( COTP ) effort address minimize barrier successful care management grow number community-dwelling old adult . The COTP start initial baseline assessment ; follow baseline assessment , divide several core service . CGs receive care management service , include contact , support , active listening , well write material regard caregiving dementia referral appropriate community service . CGs also offer Telehealth Education Program ( TEP ) , manualized program develop provide education psychosocial support individual care old adult clinically significant cognitive impairment/dementia . This research project seek evaluate feasibility , acceptability , individual-level outcome subset participant engage COPT program . Specifically , investigator examine impact COPT program function wellbeing participate cognitively impaired PACE/PACENET beneficiary informal CGs . Retrospective clinical program data COTP beneficiary CGs collect intake ( i.e. , baseline ) , course care management , program termination ( i.e. , approximately 3 month follow intake ) extract clinical database program evaluation purpose . The researcher use data collect clinical program evaluate CR CG characteristic , self-reported need , care participation , predictor improve outcomes 3 6 month . A single follow-up research evaluation conduct 6 month post baseline . This 6 month follow-up research interview evaluate extent clinical care management program ( COTP ) old adult clinically significant cognitive impairment and/or dementia CGs , 1 ) facilitates access use medical social service , 2 ) improves CR ( e.g. , behavioral symptom , delayed nursing home placement ) CG ( e.g. , CG mastery , burden , affect ) outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 18 old , male female . 2 . The beneficiary screen positive clinically significant cognitive impairment ( BOMC score > 14 ) Care Recipient Baseline BHL COTP interview agree allow COPT staff speak CG , OR , beneficiary could complete Care Recipient Baseline BHL COTP interview , agree allow COPT staff speak CG behalf , CG verify beneficiary clinically significant cognitive impairment ( via AD8 score 2 ) and/or dementia diagnosis make health care provider . 3 . CG provide verbal informed consent use retrospective clinical BHL COTP data participation 6 Month Outcome Research Evaluation completion 3 Month Program Termination visit . Not meet inclusion criterion list .
